phrs.translation: 肾部分切除术, 切除术, 部分肾切除术, 部分切除术
肾癌根治术, 根治性肾切除, 除手术, 根治性肾切除术
腹腔镜肾切除术, 后腹腔镜肾切除
经腰肾切除术, 翻译
腹腔镜肾癌根治术, 肾癌根治术, 切除术, 腹腔镜根治性肾切除术

sentences.sentence: Method: Hand-assisted laparoscopic radical nephrectomy was performed on 19 patients with renal tumors.
sentences.translation: 方法：采用手助腹腔镜根治性肾切除术治疗肾肿瘤19例。

sentences.sentence: Methods: Hand-assisted laparoscopic radical nephrectomy was performed on 21 patients with renal tumors.
sentences.translation: 方法：采用手助腹腔镜根治性肾切除治疗肾肿瘤21例。

sentences.sentence: Objective to evaluate the significance of chemotherapy embolization of renal artery for radical nephrectomy.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨肾动脉化疗栓塞对肾癌根治术的意义。
